The Sanabria
a British West Indies
Vacation Home

This British West Indies style luxury home design was created to capture long water views from the properties backyard. It features open flowing casual indoor and outdoor spaces to capitalize on the breath-taking views and tropical climate. The home features 32′ of stacking french doors which totally open the Leisure Room to the Veranda beyond. The upstairs Study with its exposed trusses and sunlit dormers make it a cherished retreat for its owners.

LUXURY CUSTOM HOME THE Sanabria
